summary: A mysterious creature "Kyubey" offers a young girl named Madoka Kaname the chance to have any one wish granted to her. In exchange she must battle evil creatures named "Witches" at the risk of losing her life.
cast: Aoi Yûki|Chiwa Saitô|Eri Kitamura|Kaori Mizuhashi|Ai Nonaka|Emiri Kato|Ryôko Shintani|Yûko Gotô|Tetsuya Iwanaga|Junko Iwao|Seiko Yoshida|Nobuo Tobita|Shin'ichirô Miki|Yoshitsugu Matsuoka|Hideki Tasaka|Tomoko Nakamura|Seiro Ogino|Rumi Okubo|Rei Matsuzaki|Ayane Sakura|Christine Marie Cabanos|Kyle Hebert|Carrie Keranen|Lauren Landa|Shelby Lindley|Jason Charles Miller|Marianne Miller|Cassandra Lee Morris|Carrie Savage|Karen Strassman|Cristina Valenzuela|Sarah Anne Williams
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part 1: Beginnings
